using namespace std;
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
#include<cstring>
#include<algorithm>
int n;
char s1[2000],s2[26];
int main()
{
    int i,j,k;
    scanf("%d\n",&n);
    while(n--)
    {
      gets(s1);
      gets(s2);      
      k = strlen(s1);
      for(i=0;i<k;i++)
      {
        if(s1[i]==' ') continue;
        s1[i] = s2[(s1[i]-'A')];
      }
      printf("%s\n",s1);
    }
    return 0;
}
